maml:description.maml:para: Export a hashtable of log message objects to a CSV file.
Sort the log message objects by their Timestamp property. Export the log message objects to a CSV file. Write the file path to the Information stream.
Log file to create
Log messages which have not yet been written to disk
Hostname of the computer running this function.
Can be provided as a string to avoid calls to HOSTNAME.EXE
Username to record in log messages (can be passed to Write-LogMsg as a parameter to avoid calling an external process)
Output stream to send the log messages to

maml:description.maml:para: Prepend a prefix to a log message, write the message to an output stream, and write the message to a text file. Writes a message to a log file and/or PowerShell output stream
Prepends the log message with: a current timestamp the current hostname the current username the current command (function or file name) the current location (line number in the code)
Tab-delimits these fields for a compromise between readability and parseability
Adds the log message to either: * a hashtable (which can be thread-safe) using the timestamp as the key, which was passed to the $Buffer parameter
* a Global:$LogMessages variable which was created by the PsLogMessage module during import
Optionally writes the message to a log file
Optionally writes the message to a PowerShell output stream
Message to log
Add a prefix to the message including the date, hostname, current user, and info about the current call stack
Log messages which have not yet been written to disk
Splats for the command at the end of the -Text parameter. E.g. Write-LogMsg -Text 'Get-Process' -Expand @{Name = 'explorer'} Has a resultant $Text value of: Get-Process -Name explorer
Used to override key-value pairs in the Expand parameter.
Text file to append the log message to
Output the message to the pipeline
{{ Fill ProgressAction Description }}
Suffix to append to the end of the string
Hostname to use in the log messages and/or output object
Output stream to send the message to
